common.name: Name
common.search-alert-message: An error occurred while searching the dictionary. Please try again later.
common.something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

update.update-message: A new version of TaalWiz is available. Click OK to update now.

content.single-hashtag: This hashtag does not occur elsewhere.

user.contact-header: Please use this form to submit suggestions for improvement or to report issues you may have encountered with using TaalWiz.
user.contact-sent: Your message was sent successfully. Thank you for your feedback.
user.contact-failed: Could not send your message, please try again later.

auth.code-email-mismatch: Registration code does not match email address.
auth.password-change-failed: Could not change your password, please try again later.
auth.password-reset-success: Password reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
auth.password-reset-request-sent: Password reset request sent. Please check your email for further instructions.
auth.forgot-password: Forgot Password? Click here to reset it.
auth.password-reset-instructions: Please enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
auth.register-message: Please enter your name and a password to use with TaalWiz. Please note that the password is unique to TaalWiz and not related to the password that you use with your email provider.
auth.registration-failed: Could not register you, please try again later.
auth.login-failed: Could not log you in, please try again later.
